song_lyrics: Shu karashe sansārī kahīne re Hari variyā,
Chālī jag māthe pag daīne re Hari variyā. 1
Jem shūro raṇmā khele re Hari,
Shatru sanmukh pagalā mele re Hari꠶ 2
Thaī nihshank laḍāī leve re Hari,
Ke’dī pāchhā pag nav deve re Hari꠶ 3
Em samajīne hu to chālī re Hari,
Manmā maravānī ānṭī zālī re Hari꠶ 4
Sau sāthe te nāto toḍyo re Hari,
Hāthevāḷo te Harisu joḍyo re Hari꠶ 5
Brahmānand kahe thaī matvālī re Hari,
Māthā sāṭe varyā vanmāḷī re Hari꠶ 6
title: Shu karashe sansārī kahīne re Hari variyā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1070: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
